Welcome to Niharika's personal blog—an intersection of data, technology, and creativity. Niharika is a seasoned Data Science Manager with a seven-year track record in leading teams focused on Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, and Deep Learning.

Niharika is proficient in guiding teams specializing in Consumer Behavior Analytics, Predictive Modeling, Deep Learning, and more, particularly within the domains of eCommerce and Ad Tech. Her passion lies in translating quantifiable data into actionable insights that positively shape businesses. Niharika brings a unique blend of market awareness and technical prowess, ensuring the delivery of user-centric products and solutions.

When not innovating on data platforms, Niharika unwinds by molding clay on a potter's wheel and immersing herself in the strokes of paint on canvas.

Explore Niharika's blog to embark on a journey where data points weave stories, and algorithmic solutions propel us toward a clearer, more informed future.
